name: HiScore
bio: HiScore (2012) - Sebastian Mårtensson (Tallon Overworld 2 / choir arrangement for Ridley’s Theme / Project lead), Samuel Lidström (Brinstar / Kraid’s Lair (music) / Rundas Battle Theme (music) / Ridley’s Theme / Overall Mix of medley), Pontus Lundén (Brinstar / The Tunnel / Ridley’s Theme), Erik Nordlander (Brinstar / Prime Hunters Theme / Ridley’s Theme), Thomas Lundell (Mother Brain), Timmy Midhamn (Additional guitar – Mother Brain), David Lindvall (Nightmare / Torvus Bog), Martin Åberg (Nightmare / Torvus Bog), Konrad Petersson (Arranged the choir to Kraid’s Lair), Hampus Larsson (Torvus Bog / Prime Credits – percussion), Joel Sandberg (Prime Credits – piano/strings), Oskar Ottosson (Rundas Battle Theme – song structure and arrangements), Pim Jönsson (Vocals on Tallon Overworld 2), Maria Önnberg (Spoken monologue at intro).
